√dakṣ 'be able'

present: [1.] dákṣate etc.  dákṣati  

perfect: dadakṣe  

aorist: [3.] adadakṣat   -- [5.] adakṣiṣṭa  

future: [1.] dakṣiṣyate   -- [2.] dakṣitā  

secondary: causative: dakṣayati etc.  

derivatives: dákṣa V.+  dákṣas V.  dakṣā́yya RV.  /dakṣiṇa V.+
